title: Sample, ca. 1949
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (sample): 17 x 19.5 cm (6 11/16 x 7 11/16 in.)
H x W (card): 31.8 x 27.9 cm (12 1/2 x 11 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description: Plain weave with paired warps and textured yarns. Warp has paired warps of green two-ply yarn and brown two-ply yarn. Weft has a repeating sequence of blue textured yarn, red two-ply yarn, green boucle, and green chenille.
